attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop tax payers money being used as bonuses by rbs untill they repay the british tax payer .when tax payers money has been repaid then they have the right to pay themselves bonuses as a job well done.gordon brown must stop this company misuseing hard earned british tax payers money now or stop funding them

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
